alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Ellis; Kiowa; Pawnee; Rush; Stafford; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 01 at 3:02PM CST until December 02 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM CST FRIDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 030, 031, 046, 065, 066, 079, AND 080... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 6 PM CST Friday. * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 030 Trego, Fire Weather Zone 031 Ellis, Fire Weather Zone 046 Rush, Fire Weather Zone 065 Pawnee, Fire Weather Zone 066 Stafford, Fire Weather Zone 079 Edwards and Fire Weather Zone 080 Kiowa. * WINDS...West to northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * IMPACTS...
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Edwards; Ellis; Kiowa; Pawnee; Rush; Stafford; Trego
